Package com.brightcove.player.media.tasks

tasks Contains the AsyncTask implementations to handle the execution of Media API requests on a background thread (or quite simply not on the main UI thread in Android).

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FindMediaTask
    FindMediaTask is a base Task that others in this package should extend.
    FindPlaylistTask
    Task to find a single Playlist by Playlist ID or Reference ID.
    FindVideoTask
    Task to find a single Video by Video ID or Reference ID.

Package com.brightcove.player.media.tasks Description

tasks Contains the AsyncTask implementations to handle the execution of Media API requests on a background thread (or quite simply not on the main UI thread in Android). FindMediaTask - has core functionality used by all Media Read API tasks FindVideoTask - provides specific logic to process a single Video in the response JSON FindPlaylistTask - provides specific logic to process a single Playlist in the response JSON
